preqs: Students must have passed MKG1120 or MKW1120 or MKS1120 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {3200, GBU3410%, MKB3410, MKB3444, MKC3220, MKC3224, MKF3531, MKG3444%, MKS3444, MKT243, MKT353, MKT3531, MKW3444%, MKW3531, MKX3531}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKB1200, MKG1120, MKP1120, MKS1120, MKW1120} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MKB3531, MKC3220, MKC3224, MKF3531, MKG3444, MKW3444}

description: The unit covers environmental factors affecting international marketing, the field of international business, international marketing research and marketing decisions, entry strategies, marketing planning, controlling and strategy for international business.
